tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have been taking my son since he was 6 days old, now he is 15. Brilliant brilliant doctor, never gives extra medicine, focuses more on the nutritional aspect. He is extremely friendly with the kids and very strict with the parents. There's no better pediatrician than him

** ** * ***** ******  He has vast experience in his field of child care.  Gives less medicines which are easy to take by the child.  

I visited him for my grand daughter.  He encouraged her for eating well and gave very less medicines.  Moreover, he calls the patient again, only if it is required otherwise, he encourages the kids to eat healthy diet instead of eating medicines.

God bless Doctor A. J. Chitkara with long life and good health because such kind of doctors are required on this earth. üôèüíê
Dr Chitkara loves to humiliate new moms on the choice of feed and care they are providing for their new borns. He needs to be more sensitive.

It was my first visit to Dr chitkara and trust me it was a very bad experience. My 10 months old baby was suffering from fever I went to him just to take a second opinion as he is a senior doctor in the town. ** ***** ** * **** ****** *** ** ********* ******** ******* ** **** He doesn't give a satisfactory answers to your questions. His answers may encourage you to leave his cabin. He just kept on shouting without listening to us. He didn't bother about your concern he thinks whatever he is speaking patient have to obey that without asking any question. He was not even ready to tell me about the purpose of syrup which he was recommending to my 10 months old baby. He used very harsh words to me and my mother in a very first interaction. His tone was just very unpleasant for me. I would not recommend anyone to visit him. I visited him with so much hope and I just returned highly disappointed.

Not at all satisfied the way he treats his patients. I went for treatment of my son with certain rare disorder, ** *** *** **** ** ***** *** **** ****** ** ***** ** ********* **** ** ** *** **** ** **** *** ******* *** discussing with senior doctors he used to question the psychological factors of my son and the whole family and used to doubt that child is lying on the symptoms we shared with him.

Finally I had to consult ******* ****** doctors in different hospital for the treatment *** *********** *** ********* *********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Very nice and Very much Qualified Doctor. I Travel from South Delhi to Pitampura as I trust only Doctor Chitkara. Prescribes less medicines and tests. He has Great command.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Pathetic experience, doctor is very rude *** ***** **** **** *** ** **** ** ******* ********. almost all pediatrics are same hence please visit a doctor who is near to your house *** ****** *** ****..
Very irritating doctor always be on angry  mood not give proper answer about the problem.  As per the fees doctor are not recomented
Impolite and rude behaviour. Does not listens to the problem properly and ignore questions asked about child's health.
